Test Case Description: Add, update, and remove items from the cart.
Test Steps: Add to cart ‡ signin ‡ add to cart ‡ notification ‡ cart item length increase ‡ click delete icon ‡ notification for delete confirmation ‡ remove ‡ item length will be zero.
Expected Result: Product Add to cart and remove from cart successfully done.
Actual Result: Product Add to cart and remove from cart successfully done.

Test Case Description: Verify individual product detail pages load correctly.
Test Steps: Navigate to shop and on click details button ‡ it will navigate to dynamic route (single-product) page and show the product details with slug url.
Expected Result: Navigate to dynamic route and show details of product successfully.
Remarks: Successfully display and no issue found.

Test Steps: DevTools ‡ inspect ‡ lighthouse ‡ Select the appropriate categories (Performance, Accessibility, Best Practices, SEO) ‡Generate Report
Open the website in Chrome, Firefox, and Edge.
Expected Result: Consistent rendering and functionality across all browsers.
Actual Result: Chrome: All elements render correctly. Fast performance, no errors.

Test Steps: Verify layout, fonts, and functionality consistency across browsers.
Expected Result: No layout, font, or interactive element issues.
Actual Result: Firefox: Slightly slower performance; minor font rendering differences, but no major issues.

Test Steps: Test responsiveness on different screen sizes.
Expected Result: Fast performance with no console errors or significant delays.
Actual Result: Safari: Minor lag in CSS transitions, no rendering or functional issues.

Test Steps: Check for performance differences and errors in the browser console.
Actual Result: Edge: Rendering and functionality consistent with Chrome. No issues.

Test Steps: The layout, fonts, and interactive elements adapt correctly to all device sizes
Expected Result: Responsive across all devices with no layout or functionality issues
Actual Result: Responsive across all devices with no layout or functionality issues
